name: Hay day Chichens Run Adventures
description:
Better. Closed. Already. Welcome to Chichens ninja adventure, the most popular farm game on mobiles and tablets.

Our team is proud to present - "The Adventure Chichens Ninja Who Thought He Was a Ninja!"

~~~~~~~~~~
HISTORY: Chichens ninja adventure
~~~~~~~~~~

A terrible, unfortunate and more serious accident occurred by leaving our poor Chichens Ninja who calls himself poor chichens in a vast and dangerous forest and jungle full of obstacles and enemies. This Chicken Chichens ninja really believes that he is a true ninja Chichens and hero of the jungle and not just any ninja - the best ninja of all! With the biggest powers already granted to the ninja before as speed, jump and slip. Our poor Chichens Ninja is now in a dangerous situation, he must avoid all obstacles and enemies of the jungle, forest to prove to all the other chichen chickens of the region that he is really a hero a ninja courageous that The other Chichens.

So this is the time to start to help your chicken "Chichens Ninja hero" to escape all obstacles and get your coins.

~~~~~~~~~~
HOW TO PLAY: Chichens ninja adventure
~~~~~~~~~~

Simply click on the screen so our chicken "Chichens Ninja" skips all obstacles. This farm chicken "Chichens Ninja" race is the best adventure game. It has the best fun racing game with a good graphics and music.

1. Press the screen to jump hero chicken ninja "Chichens Ninja".

2. Collect the eggs as much as you can without falling.

3. Run until the end of the levels to reach the end of the course by our super ninja hero chicken.

~~~~~~~~~~
FUNCTIONALITY: Chichens ninja adventure
~~~~~~~~~~

. completely different and challenging levels in this super free adventure game of chichen adventure ninja (and we know they will be more to come).
. In each season, you encounter various obstacles and enemies. Help your hero ninja chicken to adapt to its natural environment.
. Dozens of missions and internships to complete to become a real hero ninja of all chickens.
. Cool and unique graphics of the characters chickens, enemies, obstacles and jungle.
. Motivational music, especially for adventure and challenge.
